articles.author: Aisha Rimi
articles.title: UK pledges extra £1.3bn in military support for Ukraine - The Independent
articles.description: Boris Johnson said the UK would help Ukraine ‘continue to push back the Russian invasian and survive as a free and democratic country’
articles.content:
The UK will provide an extra £1.3bn in military support to Ukraine, in a dramatic escalation of assistance for Volodymyr Zelenskys forces as they fight the Russian invasion.

articles.title: Where Should I Invest? Asean Stocks May See More Tailwinds - Bloomberg
articles.description: Fed hikes, decades-high inflation and Covid lockdowns in China are only adding to investor bets that Southeast Asia’s stock markets may be one of the best places to park their money right now.
